resources.string: This app adds modern medical terms to your keyboard autosuggest and autocorrect.

It is based on two medical dictionary projects: OpenMedSpel by e-MedTools and Co-Med-Spel-Chek by Rajasekharan N. The wordlist contains over 90,000 medical terms but is easily processed by a modern phone.
The two sources have been merged, deduplicated, corrected and formatted. Please be patient during import.
